name: teams-force-filestab-provision
title: Force Team Files Tab Provision
shortDescription: This script allow us to force Files tab provision, usefull for migrations or even for your Team's governance toolset..
longDescription: Sometimes when we create a Team , the Files Tab is not immediately provisioned, this enforce that provision. The script is a subset of the SPO powershell packages with content (PnPCandy) concept already been used across many projects.

references.name: Want to learn more about PnP PowerShell and the cmdlets
references.description: Check out the PnP PowerShell site to get started and for the reference to the cmdlets.
